channel.title: Posts on Taciturn Text
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Taciturn Text

item.title: In the Beginning*
item.description: *Well not really the beginning This is a post overdue, to a blog I should have started a while ago, if not to achieve anything other than a “I could so I did” thing. After multiple failed attempts using blogger, wordpress, et al. I stopped because I didn’t really like the workflow. 1 So I’m not one to bear the burden of a over-heavy work-flow, if it should take much work to spew my words into the void I likely won’t.
